itemLabel: Douglas Houghton, Baron Houghton of Sowerby

wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Leslie Noel Douglas Houghton, Baron Houghton of Sowerby,  (11 August 1898 – 2 May 1996) was a British Labour politician. He was the last British Cabinet minister born in the 19th century. After he retired in 1967, every Cabinet minister has been born since 1900. He was also the last veteran of World War I to serve in the Cabinet and both Houses of Parliament.

response: *Douglas Houghton, Baron Houghton of Sowerby (1898–1996), Labour politician, last surviving cabinet member born in the 19th century and serving in the First World WarObituary, The Independent, retrieved 1 August 2012.
